about_the_game:
WISHLIST IT BEFORE IT'S LATE



Welcome to the high-octane world of "AutoBrawl," where the stakes are as high as the horsepower under the hood. In this adrenaline-pumping game, you'll experience the thrill of car auctions like never before, as only one player in the entire world can emerge victorious and claim the most sought-after vehicles. But the cars you win won't just be sitting pretty in your garage - they're your ticket to an epic showdown on treacherous terrains filled with 100 other players, all vying to be the last one standing.

Key Features:


1.Unique Car Auctions: "AutoBrawl" boasts an innovative car auction system where you bid against players from around the globe to acquire exclusive, one-of-a-kind vehicles. Each car has its own strengths and weaknesses, and your strategic choices in the auctions will determine your chances of success on the battlefield.

2.Battle Royale Terrain:Once you've secured your prized vehicles, it's time to prove your mettle in the most challenging battle royale terrain ever seen in a game. Navigate through rugged landscapes, dense forests, urban sprawls, and more, all while outwitting and outmaneuvering your opponents.

3. 100-Player Showdown: Compete against 100 other players in a high-stakes battle for supremacy. Only one can emerge as the ultimate victor. Form alliances, engage in intense vehicular combat, and use your cunning strategies to outlast the competition.

4. Realistic Physics and Graphics: "AutoBrawl" delivers an immersive gaming experience with stunning graphics and realistic physics. Feel the roar of the engines, the jolt of the terrain, and the thrill of the chase in every heart-pounding moment.

5. Global Leaderboards: Compete against players worldwide to climb the global leaderboards and establish your reputation as the ultimate car auction champion and battle royale survivor.

6. Constant Updates and Events: "AutoBrawl" keeps the excitement revved up with regular updates, new car releases, and special in-game events that challenge your skills and reward your dedication.

In "AutoBrawl," only the best can claim the title of the world's greatest car collector and battle royale champion. Are you ready to put the pedal to the metal, outsmart your rivals, and stake your claim in the automotive apocalypse? Get ready to enter a world where one car, one winner, and one ultimate survivor reign supreme.

name: AutoBrawl : One World, One Winner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: AutoBrawl : Strategically bid for unique vehicles, battle in a 100-player showdown on diverse terrains, and climb global leaderboards. With realistic graphics and frequent updates, stake your claim as the ultimate car collector and battle royale champ. Ready for the automotive apocalypse?
